source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_00<tab>Something in the air has Ponnixia distressed.
target: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_00<tab>シルフの仮宿のポニシアは、森の空気が悪くなっていて困っているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_01<tab>Malevolent sylphs have been working their mischief on the forest's mushrooms, lacing them with a poisonous powder that coaxes them to emit toxic fumes. Wash them with spring water to spare the sylphs of Little Solace from a coughing epidemic.
target: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_01<tab>瘴気の発生をくいとめるため、発生源であるシルフ領の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E912A01 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E891C01 /var>」を使おう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_02<tab>You have doused the mushrooms, removing their poisonous properties. Inform Ponnixia she may breathe easy again.
target: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_02<tab>瘴気の発生をくいとめることができた。シルフの仮宿の「ポニシア」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_03<tab>Ponnixia takes a deep breath, savoring the clean, crisp forest air. Once again, you have proven yourself a true friend to Little Solace and its inhabitants.
target: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_03<tab>ポニシアに報告した。ポニシアは、森の空気が清浄に戻ったことを、とても喜んでいるようだ。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_TODO_00<tab>Douse the greater banestools with spring water.
target: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_TODO_00<tab>シルフ領の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E912A01 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E891C01 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_000<tab>Just when this one thought touched ones couldn't get any nastier! Does friendly one smell something funny in the air?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_000シルフ領の「」が、
悪い子シルフの連中に細工されて、
瘴気をバンバン出して、森の空気をけがしてるでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_001<tab>This one saw touched ones scattering strange powder on stinkshrooms, making nasty stink even stinkier! These ones cannot stop sniffling and sneezing.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_001ホントなら、このキノコは、
森の空気をおいぴくちてるはずなのでふっち……。
悪い子シルフの連中、ゆるせないでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_002<tab>Please, friendly one! Wash nasty one's nasty powder off of stinkshrooms, before all of these ones become sickly ones.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_002だから、を探して、
この「」をまいてほしいのでふっち。
そしたら、キノコは元通りになるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_005<tab>Please, friendly one! Wash powder off of stinkshrooms, before all of these ones become sickly ones.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_005を探して、
この「」をまいてほしいのでふっち。
そしたら、キノコは元通りになるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_010<tab>This one's nose has stopped tingling. Friendly one has cleaned stinkshrooms of their stink, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_010お帰りなのでふっち！
……言わなくてもわかるのでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_011<tab>These ones breathe a sigh of relief. Ahhhhhh, does friendly one not too love the sweet smells of the forest?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_011スーハースーハー……
う～ん、空気がおいしいのでふっち！
よくやってくれたのでふっち！
